item.title: Birth of this Microblog
item.description: Dunno what I’m doing but this is cool :) and makes me very happy! Took me way too long to realize the reason this wasn’t working was because I don’t know how to read instructions lol.

item.title: Focus & Hell Yeah or No
item.description: Focus Being in the zone—aka being in a [[Quotes#Flow by Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi|flow state]]—is arguably one of the most awesome, fulfilling feelings out there.

item.title: Serendipity, file management, health
item.description: Serendipity and math $Luck = f(A, E) = f(D, S, E)$ Luck is a function of $A$ - Surface Area.

item.title: Statistics & personal projects
item.description: Statistics Fun. It’s everywhere. [[Images/Beautiful visualizations.png |Beautiful visualizations]] spark joy. ![[Images/Beautiful visualizations.png]] Personal Projects A [[Diary/Birth of this Microblog#Recent Observation|recent observation]] of the kinds of personal projects I pursue has prompted me to ask myself this question:

item.title: What the heck is CRISPR?
item.description: Foreword I’ve just now realized I can learn about molecular biology on my own outside the lab (duh lol). I say I study Molecular and Cell Biology (MCB) and Public Health at UC Berkeley, so it’s time to act like it.

item.title: Your brain on steroids
item.description: What do roids do to your brain? Let’s find out. The Role of Neurotransmitters Dopamine: Steroids and PEDs can lead to increased dopamine levels in the brain.

item.title: Your brain while depressed
item.description: Mental health is obviously no joke. So, what goes on in the brain during depression? The Role of Neurotransmitters Serotonin: Serotonin, a neurotransmitter primarily found in the brain’s raphe nuclei, regulates mood, emotions, and sleep-wake cycles.
